goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 428kB)
graph_title: The percentage of households with access to at least a basic level of water
indicator_name: Proportion of population using safely managed drinking water services
target_name: By 2020, protect and restore water-related ecosystems, including mountains, forests, wetlands, rivers, aquifers and lakes
source_organisation_1: eThekwini Department of Water and Sanitation
computation_definitions: The number of consumer units  provided with access to a FREE basic level of potable WATER either by means of a yard supply households (ground tank or metered flow limiter connected to a yard tap) or, for informal settlements, by a standpipe within 200m.
